title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: When I click on the "OK" button and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com".
2. Open the hyperlink builder and observe the title.
